title: Il Rinnovamento Scenico di Balla [Balla's Renewal of Set Design] Essay by Guido Balla from "Progetti Scenici per 'Sintesi Futuriste'" Portfolio
description: Text in Italian printed in three columns, flush right.  The essay by Guido Ballo discusses the futurist movement generally and places Balla in the context of futurism and futurist set design. The essay includes a reproduction of the written text by Balla that appears on portfolio cover (1999-6-5-1). The text is followed by author's printed signature beneath which are bibliographic references.
name: Text Page
